name: Jr. Keith Hahn
review: I hope the best experience I have get from Royalish Resort. Thanks All Royalish Resort Member for supporting Us As their Best By 24 hours all. Specially Thanks Mr Nazmul (Front Office Manager) & Mr Shipon (Event Manager) for there tremendous Support Last three days simultaneously. So far My Best Wishes for Royalish Resort. Will Come Back soon In sha Allah.

name: Angelita Tucker
review: Event management is always hectic but here we got amazing support and the property is outstanding. We want to arrange more events here.From start to end we got all the logistical support and other supports.Highly recommend place for Business events.

name: Wilder Yang
review: Resort is very neat & clean and every room interior is damn good . I'm really happy with their service. Special thanks to Mr. Nazmul Rashid, Front office manager for his best support in guest caring. Hope to visit this resort again soon.
